_meta.description: Macro-structural Tension baselines for narrative genres (0.0 to 1.0 expected strain over normalized timeline)

Thriller / Action.description: Steadily rising tension with a sharp act 3 climax.

Drama.description: Slow burn, moderate oscillatory tension, character-driven peaks.

Comedy.description: Frequent oscillation representing joke setup/punchline rhythms.

Horror.description: Low baseline punctuated by extreme, sudden high tension spikes.
